definitions.title: n.pr.loc. Sin
definitions.body: , i.e. Pelusium, E. frontier city of Egypt (Egypt. 'Imt = clay, of which [[סין]] is transl. (cf. Aram. [[סְיׇן]] clay), acc. to Steindorff:BAS i. 599, who cp. II hlou/sion (phlo/v = dirt, mud), cf. Brugsch:Dict. Gêogr. 108l ff.);—Ez Eze 30:15 (LXX Sain acc.), + v:Eze 30:16, but here Co Toy rd. plausibly [[סון]], i.e. [[סְוׇן]] = Syene (v. [[[סְוׇן]]], [[סְוֵנֵה]]), LXX suhnh.—On Pelusium v. Bd:Egypt. 4 (1898), 169.
